p: Retinol and retinyl esters exhibit a strong capacity to absorb ultraviolet radiation in the range of 300â€“350 nm [ 39]. Antille et al. conducted a study to assess the ability of retinyl palmitate to protect the skin, prevent DNA damage and protect against the induction of erythema by a single exposure to strong UVB radiation. The results clearly indicate that retinyl esters present in the epidermis have strong antiphotocarcinogenic properties and protect DNA against damage by UV radiation [ 44].
